sources.name: ADONETSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		Inv_LinkFlag as string,
		Dashboard as string,
		HLD_CARGOID as string,
		HLD_VPC as string,
		VPC as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		DealerCode as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		F_ACTIVE as string,
		CURR_DATETIME as string,
		DLR_ID as string,
		HLD_DEALERETA as string,
		Hold as string,
		AssignmentStatus as string,
		HoldGroupCode as string,
		HoldGroupDescription as string,
		HoldCode as string,
		HLD_HD_DESCRIPTION as string,
		HoldSeverity as string,
		HoldStartDate as string,
		HoldEndDate as string,
		ModelLine as string,
		Brand as string,
		HLD_MODEL as string,
		HD_LOCATION as string,
		OrderType as string,
		Customer as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		ORDER_ASSIGNMENT_DATE as string,
		HLD_CURRDATE as string,
		HoldAge as integer,
		Holiday_Cnt as string,
		RailHeadDescription as string,
		RailHead as string,
		Truck_key as string,
		RailHeadCodeDescription as string,
		Inv_LinkDate as string,
		LOC_TYPE as string,
		CustomerSold as string,
		Upfit as string,
		Wholesaled as string,
		VesselName as string,
		Market as string,
		DESTINATION as string,
		LocationType as string,
		Status as string,
		DealerName as string,
		CustomerReferenceNumber as string,
		SerialNumber as string,
		OrderNumber as string,
		Priority as string,
		ModelYear as string,
		TrimCode as string,
		ColorCode as string,
		Manifest as string,
		CurrentStatus as string,
		ReturnedFlag as string,
		AssignedFlag as string,
		Accessory as string,
		CustomerNumber as string,
		DealerAddress as string,
		DealerCity as string,
		DealerState as string,
		DealerZipCode as string,
		DealerCountryCode as string,
		DealerCountryName as string,
		MODEL_ID as string,
		ModelCode as string,
		ModelDescription as string,
		ModelGroup as string,
		LoadNumber as string,
		CARRIERTYPE as string,
		CARRIER as string,
		RouteCode as string,
		LotCode as string,
		ETADate as string,
		NMCReceiptDate as string,
		TenderDate as string,
		ReceivedDate as string,
		HoldQualifier as string,
		HOLDCMMNT as string,
		Inv_LinkFlag as string,
		Dashboard as string,
		HLD_CARGOID as string,
		HLD_VPC as string,
		VPC as string,
		Org_ID as string,
		CUST_ID as string,
		DealerCode as string,
		VPC_ID as string,
		F_ACTIVE as string,
		CURR_DATETIME as string,
		DLR_ID as string,
		HLD_DEALERETA as string,
		Hold as string,
		AssignmentStatus as string,
		HoldGroupCode as string,
		HoldGroupDescription as string,
		HoldCode as string,
		HLD_HD_DESCRIPTION as string,
		HoldSeverity as string,
		HoldStartDate as string,
		HoldEndDate as string,
		ModelLine as string,
		Brand as string,
		HLD_MODEL as string,
		HD_LOCATION as string,
		OrderType as string,
		Customer as string,
		LOCATION_ID as string,
		ORDER_ASSIGNMENT_DATE as string,
		HLD_CURRDATE as string,
		HoldAge as integer,
		Holiday_Cnt as string,
		RailHeadDescription as string,
		RailHead as string,
		Truck_key as string,
		RailHeadCodeDescription as string,
		Inv_LinkDate as string,
		LOC_TYPE as string,
		CustomerSold as string,
		Upfit as string,
		Wholesaled as string,
		VesselName as string,
		Market as string,
		DESTINATION as string,
		LocationType as string,
		Status as string,
		DealerName as string,
		CustomerReferenceNumber as string,
		SerialNumber as string,
		OrderNumber as string,
		Priority as string,
		ModelYear as string,
		TrimCode as string,
		ColorCode as string,
		Manifest as string,
		CurrentStatus as string,
		ReturnedFlag as string,
		AssignedFlag as string,
		Accessory as string,
		CustomerNumber as string,
		DealerAddress as string,
		DealerCity as string,
		DealerState as string,
		DealerZipCode as string,
		DealerCountryCode as string,
		DealerCountryName as string,
		MODEL_ID as string,
		ModelCode as string,
		ModelDescription as string,
		ModelGroup as string,
		LoadNumber as string,
		CARRIERTYPE as string,
		CARRIER as string,
		RouteCode as string,
		LotCode as string,
		ETADate as string,
		NMCReceiptDate as string,
		TenderDate as string,
		ReceivedDate as string,
		HoldQualifier as string,
		HOLDCMMNT as string,
		ErrorCode as integer,
		ErrorColumn as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ADONETSource

sinks.name: ADONETDestination
sinks.script:
ADONETSource sink(mapColumn(
		Inv_LinkFlag,
		Dashboard,
		HLD_CARGOID,
		HLD_VPC,
		VPC,
		Org_ID,
		CUST_ID,
		DealerCode,
		VPC_ID,
		F_ACTIVE,
		CURR_DATETIME,
		DLR_ID,
		HLD_DEALERETA,
		Hold,
		AssignmentStatus,
		HoldGroupCode,
		HoldGroupDescription,
		HoldCode,
		HLD_HD_DESCRIPTION,
		HoldSeverity,
		HoldStartDate,
		HoldEndDate,
		ModelLine,
		Brand,
		HLD_MODEL,
		HD_LOCATION,
		OrderType,
		Customer,
		LOCATION_ID,
		ORDER_ASSIGNMENT_DATE,
		HLD_CURRDATE,
		HoldAge,
		Holiday_Cnt,
		RailHeadDescription,
		RailHead,
		Truck_key,
		RailHeadCodeDescription,
		Inv_LinkDate,
		LOC_TYPE,
		CustomerSold,
		Upfit,
		Wholesaled,
		VesselName,
		Market,
		DESTINATION,
		LocationType,
		Status,
		DealerName,
		CustomerReferenceNumber,
		SerialNumber,
		OrderNumber,
		Priority,
		ModelYear,
		TrimCode,
		ColorCode,
		Manifest,
		CurrentStatus,
		ReturnedFlag,
		AssignedFlag,
		Accessory,
		CustomerNumber,
		DealerAddress,
		DealerCity,
		DealerState,
		DealerZipCode,
		DealerCountryCode,
		DealerCountryName,
		MODEL_ID,
		ModelCode,
		ModelDescription,
		ModelGroup,
		LoadNumber,
		CARRIERTYPE,
		CARRIER,
		RouteCode,
		LotCode,
		ETADate,
		NMCReceiptDate,
		TenderDate,
		ReceivedDate,
		HoldQualifier,
		HOLDCMMNT
	)) ~> ADONETDestination
